SELECT C.CODE_NAME cplxmc,C.CODE_VALUE cplx, NVL(Q.CZQYSL, 0) czqysl, NVL(Q.BZZWGS, 0) bwzwgssl, NVL(Q.GDZWMJ, 0) gdzwmj FROM (SELECT CODE_VALUE, CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL WHERE CODETYPE = 'CPLX' AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(CODE_VALUE, 2, 3) = '000') C LEFT JOIN (SELECT CPLX, COUNT(1) CZQYSL, SUM(BZZWGS) BZZWGS, SUM(SNGDZW) + SUM(SWGDZW) GDZWMJ FROM (SELECT TT1.QYID, TT1.CPLX, TT2.BZZWGS, TT2.SNGDZW, TT2.SWGDZW FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T1.QYID, CONCAT(SUBSTR(T2.CPLX, 0, 1), '000') CPLX FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX T1 INNER JOIN CFPA_QY_CPJS T2 ON T1.QYID = T2.QYID AND T2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE T1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') TT1 LEFT JOIN CFPA_QY_ZWYX TT2 ON TT1.QYID = TT2.QYID AND TT2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') GROUP BY CPLX) Q ON C.CODE_VALUE = Q.CPLX ORDER BY c.CODE_VALUE

SELECT C.CODE_VALUE ZWMJFW, C.CODE_NAME ZWMJFWMC, NVL(ZWSL,0) sl FROM (SELECT CODE_VALUE, CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL WHERE CODETYPE = 'ZWMJFW' AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N') C LEFT JOIN (SELECT ZWMJFW,COUNT(1) ZWSL FROM( SELECT (CASE WHEN T3.SNGDZW>=24 AND T3.SNGDZW < 60 THEN '1' WHEN T3.SNGDZW>=60 AND T3.SNGDZW < 100 THEN '2' WHEN T3.SNGDZW>=100 AND T3.SNGDZW < 150 THEN '3' WHEN T3.SNGDZW>=150 AND T3.SNGDZW < 200 THEN '4' WHEN T3.SNGDZW>=200 THEN '5' ELSE '9' END) ZWMJFW FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX T1 INNER JOIN CFPA_QY_ZWYX T3 ON T1.QYID = T3.QYID AND T3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T3.SNGDZW IS NOT NULL WHERE T1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT (CASE WHEN T3.SWGDZW>=24 AND T3.SWGDZW < 60 THEN '1' WHEN T3.SWGDZW>=60 AND T3.SWGDZW < 100 THEN '2' WHEN T3.SWGDZW>=100 AND T3.SWGDZW < 150 THEN '3' WHEN T3.SWGDZW>=150 AND T3.SWGDZW < 200 THEN '4' WHEN T3.SWGDZW>=200 THEN '5' ELSE '9' END) ZWMJFW FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX T1 INNER JOIN CFPA_QY_ZWYX T3 ON T1.QYID = T3.QYID AND T3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T3.SWGDZW IS NOT NULL WHERE T1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' ) GROUP BY ZWMJFW) Q ON C.CODE_VALUE = Q.ZWMJFW ORDER BY C.CODE_VALUE
